Name: Fruit & Nut Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist & almond flakes.
Review: A rich Christmas pudding of a cocktail.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Fruit & Nut Cocktail contains 185 calories
